title: Collard Valley Cooks: Volume One Cookbook
description: This is a great cookbook full of family recipes. It has simple ingredients that make great Southern favorites. I started a cooking video tutorial blog and the fans begged for a cookbook. This cookbook is the start of many more to come. You will not be disappointed in these recipes. The print is large with one recipe per page. The cookbook contains 105 recipes that are family favorites. Ever have to call your mom, grandmother or aunt to figure out what to put in your green beans? Well no more because my cookbook gives you the basic vegetable recipes as well.
author: Tammy Nichols
